GridUserPreferences.name: Contractor Picker List
Customer Home & Find Grid Fields

GridUserPreferences.gridOptionsJsString: { "columnDefs": [{ "headerName": "Order No", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 110, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "field":"orderId", "filter": "agTextColumnFilter",editable: true }, { "headerName": "Shipped Date", "field": "orderDate", "minWidth": 100, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "cellEditor": "agTextCellEditor", }, { "headerName": "Product Name", "sortable": true, "field":"productName", "tooltipField":"productName", "minWidth": 220,"maxWidth": 220,editable: true, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "cellRenderer" :"productImageParams" }, { "headerName": "Qty", "field": "quantity", "minWidth": 60, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "maxWidth": 60, "cellEditor": "agTextCellEditor", "cellStyle": {'text-align': 'right'} }, { "headerName": "Price", "field": "price", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 50, "cellEditor": "agTextCellEditor", "cellStyle": {'text-align': 'right'} , "cellRenderer" :"priceParams" }], "defaultColDef": { "flex": 1, "wrapText": true, "autoHeight": true, "sortable": true }, "scrollbarWidth": 10, "enableBrowserTooltips": true, "pagination": true, "paginationPageSize": 5, "filter": true, "floatingFilter": true, enableCellTextSelection: true, "domLayout": "autoHeight", suppressRowClickSelection: true, "components": { "productImageParams": productImageParams,"priceParams":priceParams}, "custom": { "dataUniqueIdField": "orderId", "rowSelection": "multiple", "csvExportOptions": { "fileName": "List_Of_Orders.csv", "skipHeader": false } } }

GridUserPreferences.gridOptionsJsString: { "columnDefs": [{ "headerName": "Invoice No", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 150, "field":"invoiceId", "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "cellRenderer" :"invoiceNoParams" }, { "headerName": "Product Name", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 250, "field":"productName", "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", }, { "headerName": "Ship Date", "field": "shippedDate","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 120, "cellEditor": "agTextCellEditor", }, { "headerName": "Qty", "field": "quantity","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 100, "cellEditor": "agTextCellEditor", }, { "headerName": "Price", "field": "price","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 150, "cellEditor": "agTextCellEditor", }], "defaultColDef": { "flex": 1, "wrapText": true, "autoHeight": true, "sortable": true }, "scrollbarWidth": 30, "enableBrowserTooltips": true, "pagination": true, "paginationPageSize": 5, "filter": true, "floatingFilter": true, "domLayout": "autoHeight", "components": { "invoiceNoParams": invoiceNoParams}, "custom": { "dataUniqueIdField": "orderId", "rowSelection": "single", "csvExportOptions": { "fileName": "Customer_bought.csv", "skipHeader": false } } }

GridUserPreferences.gridOptionsJsString: { "columnDefs": [ { "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "headerName": "Campaign Name", "field": "campaignName", "sortable": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "lockPosition": true, "checkboxSelection": true, "minWidth": 150, "cellRenderer": function(params) { return '' + params.data.campaignName + '' }}, { "headerName": "Reminder", "field": "reminder","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Start Date", "field": "startDate","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "End Date", "field": "endDate","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Purchased", "field": "purchased","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Opened", "field": "opened","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Clicked", "field": "clicked","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "Bounced", "field": "bounced","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "UnSubscribed", "field": "unSubscribed","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 150 }, ], "defaultColDef": { "flex": 1, "wrapText": true, "autoHeight": true, "sortable": true }, "pagination": true, "paginationPageSize": 10, "filter": true, "floatingFilter": true, "domLayout": "autoHeight", "custom": { "rowSelection": "multiple", "csvExportOptions": { "fileName": "List_Of_Campaigns.csv", "skipHeader": false } } }

GridUserPreferences.gridOptionsJsString: { "columnDefs": [{ "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "headerName": "Campaign Name", "field": "campaignName", "sortable": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "lockPosition": true, "checkboxSelection": true, "minWidth": 150, "cellRenderer": function(params) { return '' + params.data.campaignName + '' } }, { "headerName": "Reminder", "field": "reminder","minWidth": 100, "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Start Date", "field": "startDate", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "End Date", "field": "endDate","minWidth": 100, "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Purchased", "field": "purchased","minWidth": 100, "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Call Outcome", "field": "callOutcome", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 150, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Response Code", "field": "responseCode", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 150 }, { "headerName": "Reason Code", "field": "reasonCode", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 150 }, ], "defaultColDef": { "flex": 1, "wrapText": true, "autoHeight": true, "sortable": true }, "pagination": true, "paginationPageSize": 10, "filter": true, "floatingFilter": true, "domLayout": "autoHeight", "custom": { "rowSelection": "multiple", "csvExportOptions": { "fileName": "List_Of_Campaigns.csv", "skipHeader": false } } }

GridUserPreferences.gridOptionsJsString: { "columnDefs": [{ "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "headerName": "Campaign Name", "field": "campaignName", "sortable": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "lockPosition": true, "checkboxSelection": true, "minWidth": 150, "cellRenderer": function(params) { return '' + params.data.campaignName + '' } }, { "headerName": "Reminder", "field": "reminder","minWidth": 100, "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Start Date", "field": "startDate", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 100 }, { "headerName": "End Date", "field": "endDate","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true,"minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Purchased", "field": "purchased","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true,"minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Delivered Date", "field": "deliveredDate","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "minWidth": 150, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Bad Address", "field": "badAddress","filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "sortable": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "minWidth": 150 }, ], "defaultColDef": { "flex": 1, "wrapText": true, "autoHeight": true, "sortable": true }, "pagination": true, "paginationPageSize": 10, "filter": true, "floatingFilter": true, "domLayout": "autoHeight", "custom": { "rowSelection": "multiple", "csvExportOptions": { "fileName": "List_Of_Campaigns.csv", "skipHeader": false } } }
